title: Examining a Potential Rift Between Gronk and Belichick, and Khalil Mack Wants to Get Paid | GM Street (Ep. 253)
description:
The Ringer’s Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier discuss the alleged rift between Rob Gronkowski and Bill Belichick (04:30), the Giants' love for Saquon Barkley (08:15), and Khalil Mack looking for a big payday (21:50). Then they discuss Robert Kraft visiting Meek Mill in prison (29:05) and Aaron Rodgers’s meeting with the Dalai Lama (31:25).
You can find the official Ringer merch store here: http://bit.ly/ringershop

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
